name: CBC bug - wrong assassin poison save
author: Kane

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
I have discovered that the CBC sheet has a bug when calculating the poison saves bonus for assassins. The assassin’s save bonus vs. poison increases by +1 every 2 levels from +1 at level 2 to +15 at level 30.
For some reason it stops at +6 even if the build has more than 12 assasin levels.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content: I would never have caught this. I don't give a crap about saves LOL. Good clinical eye, Mick!
